Website Development

SERVICES

Website Design

Websites crafted personally for each client, to your liking. I make sure every website is functional, yet feels great to use. It's not just about the content, it's the experience.

Website Development

Hand-Coded websites that are optimized to today's standards. Always works on all major browsers. I can use a variey of web languages to build any site you can ask for.

Wordpress

With about 30% (about 70 million) of all websites hosted on this platform, I of course offer this, I can code a custom theme to your liking, or use one you prefer.

SEO

Search Engine Optimization is something that is crucial for any business that wants to aquire new customers, I can help you be found easily on search engines, and find new customers.

Social Media

In today's world what is a web presence if you have no social media outlets. Being someone my age means you have a profile on every site imaginable, I can help you build your business with an outstanding web presence.

E-Commerce

For those businesses that want to sell their product or service online, I can help you with a secure and easy method of getting payment, as well as making the shopping experience pleasant for your customers.
